_header: The grace of God and Holy Church

BLHar913.First Lines:
Þe grace of godde and holi churcheþroȝ uertu of
                    þe trinite…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…loke þat ȝe nab no wereFor seuȝer ȝe
                    habbiȝ to pardoun

Furnivall,  Frederick James. 
             Early English Poems and Lives of Saints.
Transactions of the London Philological Society
         1858; Pt. 2, Berlin, 1862: 1-7.

             Altenglische Sprachproben, I: Poesie.
         Berlin: Wiedmann, 1867: 1.115.
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             Die Kildare-Gedichte…
Bonner Beiträge zur Anglistik
         14. Bonn: P. Hanstein, 1904: 89-97.
Seymour,  St. John Delincourt. 
             Anglo-Irish Literature, 1200-1582.
         Cambridge: at the UP, 1929; and several repr: 58.
